author: Reuters
title: $30 mn more for WHO: China
description: China said on Thursday it would donate another $30 million to the World Health Organization (WHO), which is seeking more than $1 billion to fund its battle against the pandemic. The pledge comes after
content: China said on Thursday it would donate another $30 million to the World Health Organization (WHO), which is seeking more than $1 billion to fund its battle against the pandemic. The pledge comes after U.S. President Donald Trump suspended funding to the WHO a… [+438 chars]
